text: Vam zapreshchayetsya vstupat' v brak s materyami vashimi, s docher'mi vashimi, s sostrami vashimi; s totkami s ottsovskoy storony, s totkami s materinskoy storony; s docheryami brata vashego i s docheryami sestry vashey; s materyami vashimi, kotoryye vskormili vas grud'yu, s sostrami vashimi molochnymi, s materyami zhon vashikh, s padcheritsami vashimi, zhivushchimi v vashikh domakh, ot vashikh zhen, s kotorymi vy voshli v supruzheskiye otnosheniya (no yesli vy ne vkhodili v takiye otnosheniya, to na vas ne budet grekha zhenit'sya na nikh); s zhenami synov vashikh, kotoryye ot chresel vashikh; zapreshchayetsya imet' zhenami dvukh sestor; ostayutsya takiye braki, prezhde sego uzhe sovershivshiyesya: potomu chto Bog proshchayushch, miloserd
